Html:
Hi, I use PHPExcel extensively and it helps a lot but I've got a problem with one particular .xlsx template: when I save it with PHPExcel some unexpected styles appears even if I did not make any changes to the template file through PHPExcel. The template is created with MS Office 11 for Mac. Why I faced this problem and what can I do to solve it?

Thank you!
just solved the problem: 1) created a copy of tpl.xlsx named tpl2.xlsx 2) select all in tpl.xlsx and deleted 3) copied only needed cells from tpl2.xlsx to tpl.xlsx
